mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectGodTagResve Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ TAG_RESVE_SN , RESVE_BEG_DT , RESVE_END_DT , TAG_NM , USE_YN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM GOD_TAG_RESVE WHERE 1 = 1 AND TAG_RESVE_SN = #{tagResveSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteGodTagResve Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM GOD_TAG_RESVE WHERE 1 = 1 AND TAG_RESVE_SN = #{tagResveSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
